title: A Knack For Being A Hero
description: In a world where everyone has a superpower, his was being a geek.Cue was perfectly happy working as a tech super in the dingy basement of Seattle's Superhero Office. Or at least he was until he got mixed up with a machine that could increase superpowers, foreign agents, and a fire-wielding gang of criminals. Now he's dodging fireballs and using his power to change old tech into something that can keep him alive.Luckily, he has a knack for being a hero.
author: Jeremy Eaton
